mapper.select: select o.oid,o.oidentifier,o.muid,o.gid,o.ocount,o.ostatus,g.gprice2,g.gtitle1,g.img,g.sid,gi.b_retime from meituan_uorder o inner join meituan_goods_info g on o.gid = g.gid left join meituan_goods_intro gi on o.gid = gi.gid where muid = #{muid} order by opaytime desc

select c.cid,c.muid,c.gid,gi.b_retime,g.img,g.gtitle1,g.gprice2 from meituan_collection c inner join meituan_goods_intro gi on c.gid = gi.gid inner join meituan_goods_info g on g.gid = c.gid and c.muid = #{muid}
select * from noeval where muid = #{muid} order by oid desc
mapper.update: update meituan_uorder set pjstatus = 1 where oid = #{oid}
mapper.select: select to_char(o.otime,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') otime, to_char(o.opaytime,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') opaytime,o.*,g.gtitle1 from meituan_uorder o inner join meituan_goods_info g on o.gid = g.gid and o.oid = #{oid} and o.muid = #{muid}
